column5: The full story on this latest trip should be finished within 3-4 days, but I wanted to show you guys this little teaser of a pretty big pike I caught last week.We fished Lake St. Joseph with Slate Falls Outposts in Sioux Lookout and had a killer trip! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Vm957jwuQX0
Very nice! I'm looking forward to hearing about your trip.
That was a nice fish. I've been waiting for this report since I saw Slate Falls post a couple of your pictures on Facebook. Top notch operation. Can't wait to see the full review!
Nice catch Mike and as always thanks for sharing, always enjoy your photos and articles. You do a great job.
That Verne Hollett seems like a real character, lol.
Thanks guys!Did you see these? Yes Verne is great. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CavRt8LOP10https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QvSQDhgki-k
